2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: There's a new Batman TV series on the air, but the Caped Crusader himself is not too happy about it. How will it affect his ability to fight crime?
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Chapter Thirty-Seven

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
It's been one year since the death of Archie that took place in Life With Archie #36 shook Riverdale to its very core. The residents of the most welcoming town in America, where the chocolate malts are always delicious and the neighbors are always smiling, gather together one last time for the closing ceremony of this groundbreaking series and a celebration of a Life with Archie.

From the start, two villains have dominated the Turtles’ lives: Shredder and Krang. Now, for the first time, they come face-to-face with each other in the present day! Will they be able to overcome their differences and join forces? It’s a very special stand-alone issue that guarantees some major surprises!

The galaxy has changed beyond recognition... and nowhere more so than on Earth itself! Don't miss this all-new adventure produced in association with STAR TREK screenwriter/producer Roberto Orci!

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: In our special "Dreams And Nightmares" issue, SpongeBob dreams of runaway pants of a giant Gary and of a powerful entity whose subconscious controls Bikini Bottom's very reality! So, yeah, it's pretty surreal, even for SpongeBob. Also: Maris Wicks (Primates) brings you true facts about nightmare creatures of the deep. All this plus the talents of Bob Flynn (Bravest Warriors), James Kochalka (Glorkian Warrior), and Gregg Schigiel (X-Babies).
While Terry contines to spend time with his father in the Justice Lords timeline, Rewire makes a move that shocks the Bat-family to the bitter core!

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
AXIS TIE-INS!

Deadpool has given up violence in favor of enlightenment!

How that will protect his FauX-Men friends from the real X-Men, I don’t know.

Plus: Cowboy stuff!

Groot and Rocket only appear on the Rocket & Groot variant covers.

Francis Manapul and Brian Buccellato return – and now’s the time to take back Gotham City! Anarky now!

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: “Godhead,” act 3, part 1: Hal Jordan has to enlist the help of one of his greatest foes, Black Hand, or else watch the universe fall before the growing army of the New Gods! But getting Black Hand to help and getting him to help the way you need him to are two very different things.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Godhead, Act III, Part I: Wall

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: “The Machine Queen” part 3! Lines are drawn and strange allies are recruited as the Machine Queen assembles her army, while Anton Arcane and the Fungal Avatar take sides! Plus, Swamp Thing receives a dire visit from John Constantine!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Upgrades

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
The Batgirl of Burnside is the name on everyone’s lips…but she sure is acting strange since she took up residence in Gotham City’s outer borough! Dangerous joyrides? Photo ops? Sequins? Either Barbara Gordon’s gone off the deep end – or there’s a doppelganger under that cowl!

Commissioner Gordon and the GCPD only appear on the Darwyn Cooke variant cover.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Double Exposure

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
“Godhead,” act 3, part 2: John Stewart leads an army of Lanterns of every color in an assault on New Genesis! Getting to the New Gods’ home was nearly impossible – and battling them will be worse! The universe is counting on the multi-colored Corps, but its true hopes may depend on a select few…without rings?

Hal, Kyle, and Katma only appear on the Darwyn Cooke variant cover.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Godhead, Act III, Part II: Transfiguration

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
The ultra top-secret Batman arc known only as “Endgame,” continues – it’s a story arc so steeped in mystery, all we can tell you is the title!

The Arkham inmates and Jason Todd only appear on variant covers.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Endgame, Part Three; The First Laugh

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Batman vs. Darkseid! The penultimate chapter of “Robin Rises” is here! Can Batman bring Damian Wayne back from death? Concluded in this month’s Robin Rises: Alpha!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Robin Rises, Part Five: Black Hole Son

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Only Catwoman can help Batman now, but Catwoman is long gone! In her place? A woman more ruthless than Batman ever expected…
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: The Underworld

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
The cultish crimes continue to corrupt Gotham City – and their next target is...Clayface? Also, Batwoman’s toxic connection to Nocturna continues to spiral down to a place where even demons fear to tread

Note: Due to what was most likely an error, nowhere in this issue does it say that it is part 2 of the "How Did We Get Here?" storyline.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Muddying The Waters

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: “Family Business” part 3! Black Mask strikes! He’s out for blood – and Selina’s place on the throne of Gotham City’s criminal underworld!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Sooner or Later You Will Descend

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Godhead act three, part three.

Come and see Highfather using the Life Equation taken from Kyle Rayner.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Godhead, Act III, Part III: Storming the Gates

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Super heroes are no more! What it means to be human is in question! The world is on the brink of a new stage of evolution – or total extinction! – and it’s up to the Justice League to save it! “THE AMAZO VIRUS” continues to devastate the Western World as Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman and Lex Luthor struggle to not only contain the virus, but cure those affected by it. But as they work against the clock, a legion of assassins is out for Lex Luthor’s head. Will the Justice League protect Luthor...or the world?

Green Lantern, Green Arrow, Black Canary and Martian Manhunter only appear on the variant cover.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: The Amazo Virus, Chapter Two: Patient Zero

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Revealed at last: the secret history of Roy Harper and Oliver Queen in The New 52!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Last Call

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: It’s Supergirl’s first day as a student in the Crucible Academy! What is the mystery of the Academy? Who are her fellow students? And what happens if she decides to get herself expelled before she graduates?
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Crucible, Part 2

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Superman arrives on Paradise Island to support Wonder Woman in her darkest hour, but their bond may be breaking apart! No time for Diana to think, though, as a mythological force seemingly tied to Wonder Woman’s role as War attacks the Amazons!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: War-Torn Chapter 2

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
The King of the Seas takes on the Warlord of Gorilla City when Aquaman and Grodd collide!

Maelstrom part 3 of 6

Arthur and Mera are able to find the portal that Atlanna used to escape Atlantis. They use the trident of Neptune to take the portal alone and find themselves in Gorilla City. There they meet with Solovar, who tells them that the last time the portal was used was 15 years ago and the only gorilla who saw who came though those years ago was Grood.

Arthur asks to speak with Grood and Solovar takes him to see Grood who is in prison. Grood makes a deal with Arthur, if he can defeat him in battle Grood will tell him about that night. Grood does not fight fair but Arthur soon gets the upper hand. Grood tell him that the Queen of Atlantis came though and left with the key.

Then while Arthur is distracted Grood grabs the Trident and opens the portal again, this time dragging Arthur though with him.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Maelstrom III: The Cunning of Queens

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Behold the all-new, all-murderous Flash!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: The Savage World of the Speed Force!

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Trapped in a universe outside time, the members of Justice League Dark must survive a surreal landscape to find their way home – at the beginning of time!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: The Amber of the Moment, Part Three: The Shattered Now

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: “Godhead,” act 3, part 4: As the battle rages on New Genesis, Guy Gardner is dispatched on a dangerous mission that could change everything! But the New Gods don’t know Guy – or his secret death wish! Unfortunately, Guy wasn’t expecting an incredible temptation to appear in his way!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Godhead, Act III, Part IV: Forged in Blood

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Can there be peace and good will toward people without a price? Geoff Johns and John Romita Jr. serve up some holiday shocks as they answer this question and more in this the penultimate chapter of “MEN OF TOMORROW”! And be warned – some significant changes are in store for the Man of Steel to ring in the New Year!

THE ONYX PROTOCOL! As PROWL confronts SPIKE over the human’s betrayal, the mystery of G.B. Blackrock and the Onyx Interface deepens. Meanwhile, Tokyo becomes a battleground as Arcee faces the Constructicons… and Galvatron!

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Christmas Countdown Issue!

Ho-ho-hello and welcome to our fun-filled Christmas countdown issue! We're ticking off the days until Christmas with pages of festive fun, including a Cadence comic surprise, Herbert puzzles, and instructions on how to make your own puffle Christmas tree decorations!

What's more, every reader gets 4 free Christmas items and a packet of popping puffles! So waddle down to your local newsagent or supermarket today!
Chapters 394 - 404.

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
You know your friends from growing up? The ones you went to high school with, and are to-this-day some of the people who know you best?

Well, imagine there are only five kids in your high school, and you're all hated and feared by the world around you.

Sometimes, it's nice to take a step back and realize that what you've been told is your "team" is really something much better—your best friends.

The Young X-Men have been through a lot since coming to their Future, but the one thing that still remains a mystery is the Future Fate of Jean Grey.

With Logan Dead and Scott unavailable, Emma Frost takes it upon herself to take Jean's Training to the next level! One problem, Emma hates the Danger Room, so this Training will be Real-Life with Real Danger in the seediest part of Madripoor!

Note: Issue #38 was released before #37.
When the Monster of Gore Bay goes on a rampage, Batman takes to the air to try to stop it. But the aerial assault instead puts Batman in great danger.

Musashi’s battle with the forces of nature leads him to do something that would have been unthinkable for him in the past—he begs for help. In exchange for sustenance for a famine-ravaged village, Musashi promises to fill a position as a sword instructor in Kokura. But Musashi is reluctant to leave the village, and something still ties him to the land there.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Vol. 37

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Diana’s agreed to help Echidna rescue her kidnapped children, but when Harley Quinn perpetrates a high-profile kidnapping of her own, Batgirl demands Diana abandon her quest and help take Harley down—or else. How will Wonder Woman save all the children in time?
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Echidna Part 2 of 2

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Doomed by DEAD HAND! The colossal cosmos-spanning finale to the X-O Manowar epic of 2015 is here!

The fate of millions hangs in the balance as the forces of DEAD HAND go head-to head with the X-O ARMY! That’s right, we said X-O ARMY! Can Aric of Dacia fulfill his duty as protector of Earth? Or will this relentless force be his final hour? Valiant superstars Robert Venditti (ARMOR HUNTERS, Green Lantern) & Diego Bernard (Red Lanterns) bring the defining moment to a rollicking, universe-crunching conclusion!

It all changes right here! As volume seven of Mike Costa's epic odyssey starts, everything you know is out the window. Avatar's most messianic book undergoes its most bizarre resurrection yet as we re-create a world where... all the Gods are dead? Join in the most innovative mythology mashup ever created as God is Dead continues to redefine fantasy in Avatar style!

Available with a Regular Cover by Jacen Burrows, End of Days and Enchanting Cover by Raulo Caceres, Iconic Cover by Jose Luis, Carnage Wraparound Cover by German Nobile, and a special Gilded Retailer Incentive cover also by Caceres.

Inherited Servitude

Chapter 07 of Avaiyo, Vol. 03

Heading back to Brosha, Sekken and Iyo meet up with their guild, Emerald Moon. Reunions are cut short as a new crisis emerges that has the means to threaten the entire world. With little time to spare, they depart for Preminx...in hopes of heading off the Dark Legion. With Emerald Moon standing between two armies, it is their hope the Region of Preminx will not be soaked in blood.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Inherited Servitude

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: This issue, Batman faces danger from every direction! In the latest installment of ‘Endgame,’ the Dark Knight has to tackle the madness the Joker has unleashed on Gotham, while using his detective skills to find answers! Then, in Robin Rises: Alpha, he and the rest of the Bat-family must face the vengeful Kalibak! Could the back-from-the-dead Damian be the key to beating him? Finally, in Batman Eternal, Batman joins with the Batman of Japan for some martial arts action!

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.deck: Nell'inferno della guerra coloniale, due giovani amici si ritrovano su fronti opposti!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Italia, 1935. Sotto il giogo della dittatura fascista, la nazione si getta in un’avventura coloniale che si rivelerà più che mai cruenta e spietata… Marco ed Ettore, due giovani amici, divisi e mutati in acerrimi nemici dall’amore e dalle idee, affrontano i propri demoni personali nel calderone infernale di quella guerra, in una sfida – uno contro l’altro e ognuno con se stesso – che segnerà per sempre le loro esistenze…
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Abissinia!
